backend.description: Create SQLAlchemy model with proper typing, relationships, and indexes

backend.name: fastapi-migration
backend.description: Create and manage Alembic database migrations

backend.name: fastapi-permission
backend.description: Add new permissions and roles to RBAC system

backend.name: fastapi-test
backend.description: Generate comprehensive unit and integration tests

frontend.name: react-component
frontend.description: Create TypeScript component with Tailwind and shadcn/ui

frontend.description: Create form with Zod validation and react-hook-form

frontend.description: Create API integration with TanStack Query hooks

frontend.description: Create complete feature with API, hooks, components, and pages

frontend.name: react-page
frontend.description: Create page component and add to routing configuration

root.name: backend-first
root.description: Implement complete fullstack feature using backend-first workflow (recommended for data-driven features)
root.notes: Guides through backend implementation, type generation, and frontend integration

root.name: api-to-ui
root.description: Create complete frontend UI integration for existing backend API endpoints
root.notes: Use when backend already exists, generates API client, React Query hooks, components, and pages

root.name: fullstack-feature
root.description: Create complete end-to-end feature across backend and frontend
root.notes: Orchestrates complete CRUD feature creation with planning phase, database choice decision tree, and comprehensive implementation across all layers

root.name: api-contract
root.description: Ensure type-safe API contracts between backend and frontend
root.notes: Verify OpenAPI schema matches frontend usage, suggest improvements

root.name: deploy
root.notes: Support Docker, AWS ECS, Vercel, and other platforms

token_optimization: Use references instead of repeating documentation
Start new sessions for unrelated features
Use Plan Mode for complex features

model_selection.sonnet: Default for most tasks, fast and cost-effective

type_safety: Always regenerate types after backend schema changes
Use generated Permission enum in frontend
security: Frontend checks permissions for UX only
Use httpOnly cookies in production (not localStorage)
